Justification: To flash the code and use it without being connected to a laptop
To select different colors and animations for the leds, also to make the XIAO go to deep sleep and so on
To step up the 3.7v from the battery into 5v to power the leds with sufficient power
To convert the 3v3 logic from the xiao to 5v logic to give the leds good signal
To navigate the ui from the OLED
To stick the LED ring 3d case to the skin, used to glue costume prosthetic to the face
To charge the LiPo Battery without a dedicated charger
